messages.content:
What are these birds? Please give their names in Chinese and English.
![image](https://qianwen-res.oss-accelerate-overseas.aliyuncs.com/zen-VL/recoAll_birds.jpg)

These birds are:
Top Left: 红翅黑鹂 (Red-winged Blackbird)
Top Right: 蓝翅八色鸫 (Blue-winged Pitta)
Bottom Left: 小斑鸬鹚 (Little Pied Cormorant)
Bottom Right: 金头扇尾莺 (Golden-headed Cisticola)
